resources.string: Therapyâ€™s main focus is on mental health as well as emotional healing. A patient would go to therapy if there was any concern with their mental health such as depression, anxiety, or any form of mental disorders.
Life coaches do not have mental health training and cannot diagnose, but are there to help you set and achieve goals.
If you are in distress, or are having suicidal thoughts, Please call the Emergency Help Line with the button below
